subject: Usage of JUnit with VAfJ
msgSnippet: Has someone an opinion on where to place the JUnit tests in Visual Age for Java so they don t go away with the production code ? _ New project(s) ? _ New
messageBody:
Has someone an opinion on where to place the JUnit tests in Visual Age for Java so they don't go away with the production code ?
_ New project(s) ?
_ New packages(s) ?

or simply specific names & removed them with a script ?

thomas,
